hero.subTitle: Blood Donation
hero.p: Connect donors with those in need. Every donation can save up to three lives.

features.title: Why Choose Our Blood Bank System?
features.description: A powerful and secure platform to efficiently manage donors, hospitals, blood inventory, and operations.
features.donorMatchingDesc: Quickly find compatible donors based on blood type, location, and donation history.
features.hospitalIntegrationDesc: Seamlessly connect with hospitals to fulfill blood requests in real time.
features.inventoryDesc: Monitor and analyze blood stock levels across all types and locations in real time.
features.securityDesc: All data is encrypted and protected according to the highest medical security and privacy standards.
features.reportsDesc: Generate accurate reports on donations, inventory, and demand to support decision-making.
features.appointmentsDesc: Allow donors to schedule their visits easily and receive reminders to maintain regular donations.
